Summary Highlights of a career of accomplishments in diverse Software Engineering Leadership:  
 
I have managed people and projects for over 10 years. I have worked very successfully from my home office, at customer sites, or in a corporate office setting.  
Before working as a department and project manager, I was a Senior Programmer at IBM and creator of multiple test automation tools. I also was a key contributor to the contract Proposal Manager used at the time by IBM Professional Services.  
I garnered multiple OA's (Outstanding Achievement) awards during my IBM career  
As a manager at IBM, I was picked as the top manager in my group on 3 out of 4 employee opinion surveys.  
As a college student, I graduated Cum Laude despite working an average of well over 40 hours a week as a test technician at IBM.  
I have a strong understanding of materials and do well with mechanical and construction projects. 
 
My goal is to connect with a company where I can utilize my project management and people skills. Summary Highlights of a career of accomplishments in diverse Software Engineering Leadership:
